data.title: Kirarin☆Revolution
data.meta_description: Find clubs on the anime Kirarin☆Revolution (Kirarin Revolution) on MyAnimeList, the internet's largest anime database. Kirari Tsukishima, a gluttonous 14-year-old beauty, is a girl who does not care about idols and the entertainment world because her mind is occupied by food. Her obsession with food only causes her to be clueless about love. One day, after saving a turtle that is stranded in a tree, Kirari meets with a handsome and gentle boy named Seiji, who gives her ticket to a SHIPS (a pop...
